fields.streamEmailNotifications: Notifications about updates in Stream for internal users
fields.textFilterUseContainsForVarchar: Use 'contains' operator when filtering varchar fields
fields.authTokenPreventConcurrent: Only one auth token per user
fields.emailAddressIsOptedOutByDefault: Mark new email addresses as opted-out

tooltips.maxConcurrentWorkers: Upper limit on the number of tasks or processes that can run simultaneously in the background of a server.
tooltips.reportingEnabled: Anonymous error reports will be send to AtroCore for faster problem identification and resolution.
tooltips.fileNameRegexPattern: To enable only small letters with max. 24-symbol length use "/^[a-z]{1,24}$/".
tooltips.isStreamSide: If enabled: Stream panel will be shown in side.
tooltips.isStreamPanelFirst: If enabled: Stream panel will be shown right after overview.
tooltips.recordsPerPage: Number of records initially displayed in list views.
tooltips.recordsPerPageSmall: Number of records initially displayed in relationship panels.
tooltips.followCreatedEntities: Users will automatically follow records they created.
tooltips.authTokenLifetime:
Defines lifetime period for tokens.
0 means no expiration.
tooltips.authTokenMaxIdleTime:
Defines how long since the last access tokens can exist.
0 means no expiration.
tooltips.userThemesDisabled: If checked then users won't be able to select another theme.
tooltips.b2cMode: By default AtroCore is adapted for B2B. You can switch it to B2C.
tooltips.aclStrictMode:
Enabled: Access to scopes will be forbidden if it's not specified in roles.

Disabled: Access to scopes will be allowed if it's not specified in roles.
tooltips.textFilterUseContainsForVarchar: If not checked then 'starts with' operator is used. You can use the wildcard '%'.
tooltips.authTokenPreventConcurrent: Users won't be able to be logged in on multiple devices simultaneously.
tooltips.emailAddressIsOptedOutByDefault: When creating new record email addess will be marked as opted-out.
tooltips.passwordRegexPattern: Set password complexity rules using regular expression. Tip: use groups like (?=.*\d) to define required symbols. Follow this link to update an validation error message.
tooltips.passwordExpireDays: Define the period (in days) after which users must update their password.
tooltips.automaticFileExtensionCorrection: If enabled, the system will automatically adjust, if necessary, the extension of each uploaded file to match its MIME type.
tooltips.applicationName: We recommend keeping this value as short as possible, as the width of the browser tab is limited and you may still want to see page titles.
tooltips.customHeadCode: Add code at the end of the <head> tag. Atrocore doesn't validate custom code for you, so be sure to check your code before publishing.
tooltips.customStylesheetPath: Your custom CSS styles will be written to this file. You can make changes in it directly too.
tooltips.companyLogo: Available file types: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/svg+xml

labels.confirmLocaleChanges: If the language is removed, all your data previously entered in the multi-language fields for this locale are automatically removed via the cron job.
labels.notAllowByContent: Not allow, check by file content
labels.notAllowByName: Not allow, check by file name
labels.notAllowByContentAndName: Not allow, check by file name + file content

messages.languageMustBeSelected: At least one language should be selected.

exceptions.variableKeyInvalid: Key should start with a small letter and can consist only of letters and numbers.
